attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Drastically reduce number of MPs, and therefore make remaining MPs more accountable to their constituents through methods more fitting to 21st century, namely "E-Forums" and "E-Petitions" all MPs to consult and ask opinions of constituents before voting on important matters, and any MP not  voting in accordance with wishes of constituents, to be made accountable to the people that elected them in first place and deselected if required.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
